CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- CustomPortal 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- 서버에서 포탈의 목적지를 설정하는 함수 호출

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 포탈 이름, 목적지 정보를 보여주는 엔티티 생성
local Entity = self.Entity
local EntityPosition = Entity.TransformComponent.Position local BoxOffset = Entity.HitComponent.BoxOffset local BoxSize = Entity.HitComponent.BoxSize local Scale = Entity.TransformComponent.Scale
local SourceName = "Source" local DestinationName = "Destination" local SourceModelID = "model://5b9acc45-4a19-4e3a-90ed-63c069ceeb8e" local DestinationModelID = "model://bc2b27b1-d837-4dde-914c-c92dda56e629" local SourcePosition = EntityPosition - Vector3(0, 0.6, 0) local DestinationPosition = EntityPosition + Vector3(0, 1.8, 0)
local Source = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(SourceModelID, SourceName, Vector3.zero, Entity, nil) local Destination = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(DestinationModelID, DestinationName, Vector3.zero, Entity, nil)
Source.UITransformComponent.WorldPosition = SourcePosition Destination.UITransformComponent.WorldPosition = DestinationPosition
